thread.title: BRIEF-Hong Kong International Construction Investment Management Says ‍Funds To Sell Stake In Sky Hero, Total Thrive​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hong Kong International Construction Investment Management Says ‍Funds To Sell Stake In Sky Hero, Total Thrive​

organizations.name: brief-hong kong international construction investment management
international construction investment management group co ltd

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Hong Kong International Construction Investment Management Group Co Ltd:
* HONG KONG INTERNATIONAL CONSTRUCTION INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT - ‍FUNDS ENTERED SALE & PURCHASE AGREEMENTS TO DISPOSE INTERESTS IN SKY HERO, TOTAL THRIVE​
* TOTAL INITIAL CONSIDERATION FOR DISPOSALS HK$15,959.41 MILLION
* GROUP IS A UNIT OF HNA GROUP‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
